body: Dear Mostapha, we found the origin of the problem. is connected with the "rad parameters" component. if you plug an empty "rad parameters component" in the "grd component " in the file attached to the original message everything works [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bGawF3RRkafjqPxdK2akptD8gzJ9-DinO8upt0RsrqdHqUFS2ezQpLIfTyeWnp*UeBQCqpKbUf63S3IJxB8RuYaSg9OFYcjT/works.JPG)instead if you leave the slot empty it works only by switching false and true again in the "RunDaylightAnalysis" component [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bGawF3RRkaefYirkaFEHdDN1WQksC4mUbC0lYLI6x*3pCITr8aKbgorKK4u7zknBbhHzAtIQ*BijKigjdFENQugAUfgwncQG/noworks.JPG)Hope it helps Jennifer
